definition: same as 閻羅王|阎罗王/Yama, King of Hell/translation of Sanskrit: Yama Raja
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great

sentences.english: The skill of the disease could save lives, book in hand.
sentences.chinese: 得這種病的人能否保住性命，生殺大權在閻王爺手中。

sentences.english: He'll lie with a straight face till kingdom comes.
sentences.chinese: 就是在閻王爺面前，他撒謊也不會臉紅。
